page.title: 09Local Phrases
page.content: Clay Cross people talk differently to people in other areas.We collected{ {phrases and words}that people commonly use in Clay Cross. { LOCAL PHRASE TRANSLATION} Ayup a tha dooin?_Hello, are you well? As tha ot thisen?_Have you hurt your- self? Ees cawld me so I_He called me a name ad im a fate. so I fought him. Am rate ungree _I am very hungry. wers mi snap? where is my dinner? Giz a tut _Give me a sweet. Tab angin _Listening at some_ ones conversation. As tha bin _Have you been croggin thi mate giving your friend neer dosher an a lift on the back fell in an got of your bike near swaafee? the pond and fallen in and got dirty? Tha berer gioa _Youd better stop it.
